meanings.definition: Capable of being remembered or brought back to mind.
meanings.sent1: The story was so recallable that I could easily remember every detail.
meanings.sent2: The song's catchy tune made it easily recallable for everyone.
meanings.sent3: Her jokes were so recallable that we couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent4: The scent of fresh cookies in the kitchen was a recallable memory of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The vivid sunset was so recallable that it stayed in my mind for days.

meanings.definition: Able to be called back or summoned again.
meanings.sent1: The recallable toy was a favorite among the children at the daycare.
meanings.sent2: The lost dog had a recallable tag with the owner's contact information.
meanings.sent3: The magician's recallable tricks amazed the audience every time.
meanings.sent4: The recallable melody played by the musician lingered in the air.
meanings.sent5: The recallable password allowed access to the secure database.
